title: Every sunday client doesn't work (MAC)
body:
It seems like every sunday evening I log into the game and once I'm in the client it doesn't work to load my match history, my profile and nothing happens if I click on 'PLAY'. Anyone has help?
My internet works perfectly...

Cheers

replies.body:
If this happens every Sunday, then this may be caused by temporary routing changes at your ISP that change how your connection reaches (or in this case, doesn't reach) our servers. Before we look into your routing, we'll first need to ensure your local network settings are configured according to our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). This will make sure your network settings aren't configured in a way that they hinder or block certain types of connections to happen over the League Client.

Let me know if these steps caused any change for you.
